citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:09 am on17 June
2021. Called licensee when arrived at site. Licensee states she has sold animals and moved to Oregon and does not
plan on keeping license.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:09 am on17 June 
2021.  Called licensee when arrived at site.  Licensee states she has sold animals and moved to Oregon  and does not 
plan on keeping license. 
 
 
 
End Section
